name: bonemerang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in one turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.
